originalText.text: I chose Marc Friedman as an executive coach for the breadth of his experience – both in his legal career and his coaching career. Marc was instrumental in developing a plan to reach my goals, holding me accountable along the way and guiding me to success. I value my coaching experience with Marc and wholeheartedly recommend him to others.

text.text: I chose Marc Friedman as an executive coach for the breadth of his experience – both in his legal career and his coaching career. Marc was instrumental in developing a plan to reach my goals, holding me accountable along the way and guiding me to success. I value my coaching experience with Marc and wholeheartedly recommend him to others.

originalText.text: Marc has an amazing wealth of knowledge to share surrounding leadership development. Given Marc’s background and experiences, I knew that what we worked through surrounding my own leadership change were tried and true. Marc is kind, caring and an excellent listener. I’m grateful to have worked with him.

text.text: Marc has an amazing wealth of knowledge to share surrounding leadership development. I’m grateful to have worked with him.

originalText.text: Marc transfers his knowledge of successfully developing a legal practice to his clients by providing focus, accountability, and direction to grow your business. Marc provided me with valuable counsel in developing my practice and network of business contacts. I highly recommend his executive coaching.

originalText.text: Working with Marc has been a truly valuable, productive and enjoyable experience. His understanding of my profession has been so incredibly beneficial, and he understands what it takes to succeed. I certainly recommend Mastermethod!

originalText.text: Marc was an invaluable resource in helping me secure my desired position. He's experienced, insightful, and razor focused on getting his clients where they want to go. Highly recommended!
